atbat.des: Cardinals challenged (force play), call on the field was overturned: Yadier Molina reaches on a force attempt, missed catch error by second baseman Ben Zobrist, assist to shortstop Addison Russell. Aledmys Diaz scores. Matt Carpenter to 2nd.
